00052 /* setEmptyLink() is invoked for performing the link operation of case C */
00053 void WK_DaTrie::setEmptyLink( int index )
00054 {
00055         int startIndex, endIndex;
00056         
00057         startIndex = (mBcPos < mBcEmptyEnd)? mBcEmptyEnd: -mpBc[ mBcEmptyEnd ].Check;
00058         endIndex   = index - 1;
00059         mBcPos     = index;
00060 
00061         if( startIndex > endIndex ){
00062         /* There are no indexes between mBcPos and index because index is equal to mBcPos + 1. */
00063                 if( startIndex == mBcPos ){
00064                         if( startIndex == mBcEmptyEnd ) mBcEmptyEnd = mBcEmptyStart = startIndex + 1;
00065                         else mpBc[ mBcEmptyEnd ].Check = -( startIndex + 1 );
00066                         return;
00067                 }
00068         }
00069 
00070         mBcEmptyEnd = endIndex;
00071 
00072         while( startIndex < endIndex ){
00073         /* There are indexes between mBcPos and index. */
00074                 mpBc[ startIndex ].Base = 0;
00075                 mpBc[ startIndex ].Check = -( startIndex + 1 );
00076                 ++startIndex;
00077         }
00078         
00079         mpBc[ endIndex ].Base = 0;
00080         mpBc[ endIndex ].Check = -( mBcPos + 1 );
00081 }
00082 
00083 /* setBase() stores value into BASE[ index ] */
00084 void WK_DaTrie::setBase( int index, int value )
00085 {
00086         if( index >= mBcMax ) { extendBc(); }
00087 
00088         mpBc[ index ].Base = value;
00089         
00090         /* (wb-1) */ 
00091         if( index > mBcPos ) setEmptyLink( index );
00092 }
00093 
00094 /* setCheck() stores value into CHECK[ index ],
00095 and performs the link operation of case A and case B */
00096 void WK_DaTrie::setCheck( int index, int value )
00097 {
00098         int tmpIndex, tmpIndex2;
00099 
00100         if( index >= mBcMax ) { extendBc(); }
00101 
00102         /* Remove CHECK[ index ] from the empty-linkage. */
00103         /* (wc-1) */
00104         if( mpBc[ index ].Check < 0 ){ /* index is in the empty-linkage.*/
00105                 tmpIndex = mBcEmptyStart;
00106                 tmpIndex2 = tmpIndex;
00107         
00108                 while( tmpIndex2 != index ){ /* Find the previous index. */
00109                         tmpIndex = tmpIndex2;
00110                         tmpIndex2 = -mpBc[ tmpIndex2 ].Check;
00111                 }
00112                 if( index == mBcEmptyStart ){
00113                 /* index is the first index in the empty-linkage. */
00114                         if( mBcEmptyStart == mBcEmptyEnd )
00115                                 mBcEmptyEnd = -mpBc[ index ].Check;
00116                         mBcEmptyStart = -mpBc[ index ].Check;
00117                 }
00118                 else{
00119                 /* index is not the first index in the empty-linkage. */
00120                         mpBc[ tmpIndex ].Check = mpBc[ index ].Check;
00121                         if( mBcEmptyEnd == index ) mBcEmptyEnd = tmpIndex;
00122                 }
00123         }
00124 
00125         /* Append CHECK[ index ] to the empty-linkage. */
00126         /* (wc-2) */
00127         if( value == 0 ){
00128         /* value to be inserted in CHECK[ index ] is empty. */
00129                 tmpIndex = mBcEmptyStart;
00130                 tmpIndex2 = tmpIndex;
00131                 
00132                 while( tmpIndex2 < index ){
00133                         tmpIndex = tmpIndex2;
00134                         tmpIndex2 = -mpBc[ tmpIndex2 ].Check;
00135                 }
00136 
00137                 if( index < mBcEmptyStart ){
00138                 /* mBcEmptyStart is exchanged by index. */
00139                         mpBc[ index ].Check = -mBcEmptyStart;
00140                         if( mBcEmptyStart == mBcEmptyEnd )
00141                                 if( mBcEmptyEnd > mBcPos ) mBcEmptyEnd = index;
00142                         mBcEmptyStart = index;
00143                 }
00144                 else{ /* mBcEmptyStart is not exchanged by index. */
00145                         mpBc[ index ].Check = mpBc[ tmpIndex ].Check;
00146                         mpBc[ tmpIndex ].Check = -index;
00147                 
00148                         if( mBcEmptyEnd == tmpIndex ) mBcEmptyEnd = index;
00149                 }
00150         }
00151         else
00152                 mpBc[ index ].Check = value;
00153                 
00154         /* (wc-3) */
00155         if( index > mBcPos ) setEmptyLink( index );
00156 }

00158 /* compareTail() compares pSingleString and
00159 requested address -BASE[ index ] of TAIL */
00160 int WK_DaTrie::compareTail( int index, unsigned char *pSingleString )
00161 {
00162         unsigned char *pTmpStr;
00163         
00164         pTmpStr = mpTail - mpBc[ index ].Base;
00165         
00166         while( *pTmpStr != (unsigned char)TERMINAL && *pSingleString != (unsigned char)TERMINAL )
00167                 if( *pSingleString++ != *pTmpStr++ ) return 0;
00168         
00169         if( *pTmpStr == (unsigned char)TERMINAL && *pSingleString == (unsigned char)TERMINAL ) 
00170                 return (int)(pTmpStr-mpTail);
00171         
00172         return 0;
00173 }
00174 
00175 /* getList() gets arc labels to pList leaving from index */
00176 int WK_DaTrie::getList( int index, unsigned char *pList )
00177 {
00178         int baseIndex, ret = 0;
00179         unsigned char arcLabel = 1;
00180         
00181         baseIndex = mpBc[ index ].Base;
00182         
00183         if( baseIndex > 0 ){
00184                 do {
00185                         if( mpBc[ baseIndex + arcLabel ].Check == index )
00186                                 pList[ ret++ ] = arcLabel;
00187                         ++arcLabel;
00188                 } while( (0 < arcLabel) && (arcLabel < NUM_CODES) );
00189         }
00190         pList[ ret ] = '\0';
00191         
00192         return ret;
00193 }

00195 /* writeTailAt() defines g( index, *key ) = nextIndex,
00196 and stores the remaining string key + 1 plus '$'
00197 into the requested address tailpos of TAIL. */
00198 void WK_DaTrie::writeTailAt( int index, unsigned char *pKey, int tailpos )
00199 {
00200         unsigned int i=0;
00201         int nextIndex;
00202         
00203         nextIndex = mpBc[ index ].Base + CODE[ *pKey ];
00204         
00205         setCheck( nextIndex, index );
00206         setBase( nextIndex, -tailpos );
00207         
00208         if( *pKey != (unsigned char)TERMINAL ){
00209                 pKey++;
00210                 while( *pKey != (unsigned char)TERMINAL ){
00211                         if( tailpos >= mTailMax )
00212                         { extendTail(); }//hdhan add 2005-11-29
00213                         mpTail[ tailpos++ ] = *pKey++;
00214                 }
00215         
00216                 mpTail[ tailpos++ ] = (unsigned char)TERMINAL;
00217 
00218         }
00219 
00220         if (tailpos >= mTailPos) {
00221                 // 4byte 확보
00222                 while(i++ < sizeof(int)){
00223                         if( tailpos >= mTailMax ) { extendTail(); }
00224                         mpTail[ tailpos++ ] = 0;
00225                 }
00226         }
00227         else
00228         {
00229                 // 4byte 확보
00230                 while(i++ < sizeof(int)){
00231                         if( tailpos >= mTailMax ) { extendTail(); }
00232                         pKey++;
00233                         mpTail[ tailpos++ ] = *pKey;
00234                 }
00235         }
00236 
00237 //      mpTail[ tailpos++ ] = '$'; /* record information */
00238 
00239         if( mTailPos < tailpos ) mTailPos = tailpos;
00240 
00241         if( mTailPos >= mTailMax ) { extendTail(); }
00242 
00243         if( mBcPos >= mBcMax ) { extendBc(); }
00244 }
00245 
00246 /* xCheck() determines the minimum index q such that mBcPos > 1
00247 and mpBc[ mBcPos + 'c' ].Check = 0 for all entries 'c' in pList. */
00248 int WK_DaTrie::xCheck( unsigned char *pList )
00249 {
00250         int i, q, qCandidate;
00251 
00252         qCandidate = mBcEmptyStart;
00253         while( qCandidate <= mBcPos ){
00254                 /* (x-1) */
00255                 if( qCandidate - *pList > 0 ){
00256                         /* (x-2) */
00257                         q = qCandidate - *pList;
00258                         
00259                         /* (x-3) */
00260                         for( i = 1; pList[ i ]; ++i )
00261                                 if( mpBc[ q + pList[ i ] ].Check > 0 ) break;
00262                         
00263                         /* (x-4) */
00264                         if( !pList[ i ] ) return q;
00265                 }
00266                 /* (x-5) */
00267                 qCandidate = -mpBc[ qCandidate ].Check;
00268         }
00269         
00270         return ( qCandidate > *pList )? qCandidate - *pList: 1;
00271 }
00272 
00273 /* modify(currentIndex, index, add, pList, listsize) is invoked by insertA()
00274 if it is need to exchange values of BASE[ index ] */
00275 int WK_DaTrie::modify(int currentIndex,int index,unsigned char add,unsigned char *pList,int listsize)
00276 {
00277         int oldBase, tmp, tmp2, tmpArcLabel, tmpIndex;
00278         unsigned char *arcLabel;
00279         
00280         oldBase = mpBc[ index ].Base;
00281         
00282         if( add ){ /* insertion sort */
00283         
00284                 for( tmp = 0; tmp < listsize; ++tmp ){
00285                         if( pList[ tmp ] > CODE[ add ] ){
00286                                 for( tmp2 = listsize; tmp2 > tmp; --tmp2 )
00287                                         pList[ tmp2 ] = pList[ tmp2 - 1 ];
00288                                 break;
00289                         }
00290                 }
00291                 
00292                 pList[ tmp ] = CODE[ add ];
00293                 pList[ ++listsize ] = '\0';
00294         }
00295 
00296         setBase( index, xCheck( pList ) );
00297         
00298         /* Changing from old arcs to new arcs */
00299         for( arcLabel = pList; *arcLabel; ++arcLabel ){
00300                 if( *arcLabel == CODE[ add ] ) continue;
00301         
00302                 tmp = oldBase + *arcLabel;
00303                 tmp2 = mpBc[ index ].Base + *arcLabel;
00304                 
00305                 setCheck( tmp2, index );
00306                 setBase( tmp2, mpBc[ tmp ].Base );
00307                 
00308                 if( mpBc[ tmp ].Base > 0 ){
00309                         tmpIndex = mpBc[ tmp ].Base;
00310                         
00311                         for( tmpArcLabel = 0; tmpArcLabel < NUM_CODES; ++tmpArcLabel ){
00312                                 if( mpBc[ tmpIndex + tmpArcLabel ].Check == tmp )
00313                                         setCheck( tmpIndex + tmpArcLabel, tmp2 );
00314                         }
00315 
00316                         if( tmp == currentIndex ) currentIndex = tmp2;
00317                 }
00318         
00319                 setBase( tmp, 0 ); setCheck( tmp, 0 );
00320         }
00321         
00322         return currentIndex;
00323 }
00324 
00325 /* insertA(index,pKey) adds a pKey when that pKey mismatches
00326 in a double-array. */
00327 void WK_DaTrie::insertA( int index, unsigned char *pKey, WK_DaTrie_Node &rNode )
00328 {
00329         unsigned char listIndex[ NUM_CODES ], listUsedIndex[ NUM_CODES ];
00330         int tmpIndex, usedIndex, numListIndex, numListUsedIndex;
00331 
00332         tmpIndex = mpBc[ index ].Base + CODE[ *pKey ];
00333 
00334         usedIndex = mpBc[ tmpIndex ].Check;
00335 
00336         if( usedIndex > 0 ){
00337                 numListIndex = getList( index, listIndex );
00338                 numListUsedIndex = getList( usedIndex, listUsedIndex );
00339 
00340                 if( !numListUsedIndex || numListUsedIndex > numListIndex + 1 )
00341                         index = modify( index, index, *pKey, listIndex, numListIndex );
00342                 else index = modify( index, usedIndex, '\0', listUsedIndex, numListUsedIndex );
00343         }
00344 
00345         writeTailAt( index, pKey, mTailPos );
00346         
00347         //4byte node
00348         rNode.mState = -(mTailPos-6);
00349         rNode.mpData = mpTail+(mTailPos-4);
00350 }
00351 
00352 /* insertB(index, pKey) adds a pKey when that pKey mismatches in TAIL. */
00353 void WK_DaTrie::insertB( int index, unsigned char *pKey, WK_DaTrie_Node &rNode )
00354 {
00355         int oldPos;
00356         unsigned char *pSingleString, pList[ 3 ];
00357 
00358         oldPos = -mpBc[ index ].Base;
00359 
00360         pSingleString = mpTail + oldPos;
00361 
00362         /* Definition of same arcs */
00363         while( *pSingleString != (unsigned char)TERMINAL && *pKey == *pSingleString ){
00364                 pList[ 0 ] = CODE[ *pKey ]; pList[ 1 ] = '\0';
00365                 setBase( index, xCheck( pList ) );
00366                 setCheck( mpBc[ index ].Base + CODE[ *pKey ], index );
00367                 index = mpBc[ index ].Base + CODE[ *pKey ];
00368                 ++pKey; ++pSingleString;
00369         }
00370 
00371         if( CODE[ *pKey ] < CODE[ *pSingleString ] ){
00372                 pList[ 0 ] = CODE[ *pKey ]; pList[ 1 ] = CODE[ *pSingleString ];
00373         }
00374         else{
00375                 pList[ 0 ] = CODE[ *pSingleString ]; pList[ 1 ] = CODE[ *pKey ];
00376         }
00377         pList[ 2 ] = '\0';
00378         
00379         /* Determining new Base[ index ] for arcs {*pKey, *pSingleString} */
00380         setBase( index, xCheck( pList ) );
00381         writeTailAt( index, pSingleString, oldPos );
00382         writeTailAt( index, pKey, mTailPos );
00383 
00384         //4byte node
00385         rNode.mState = -(mTailPos-6);
00386         rNode.mpData = mpTail+(mTailPos-4);
00387 }
00388 
00389 /* create() initializes the entries of BASE and CHECK by zero,
00390 and TAIL by '\0', but, particularly, BASE[1] is initialized by 1.
00391 Note that BASE[0], CHECK[0], CHECK[1] and TAIL[0] are not used
00392 in this implementation. */
00393 int WK_DaTrie::create(int bcSize, int tailSize, int bcExtendSize, int tailExtendSize)
00394 {
00395         // init struct BC with BASE, CHECK
00396         mBcPos        = 1;
00397         mBcMax        = bcSize;
00398         mBcEmptyStart = 2;
00399         mBcEmptyEnd   = 2;
00400         mBcExtendSize = bcExtendSize;
00401 
00402         mpBc = new WK_DaTrie_BaseCheck [ mBcMax + NUM_CODES ];
00403 
00404         /*
00405         for( i = 0; i < mBcMax + NUM_CODES; ++i)
00406                 mpBc[ i ].Base = mpBc[ i ].Check = 0;
00407         */
00408         memset(mpBc, 0x00, sizeof(WK_DaTrie_BaseCheck)*(mBcMax + NUM_CODES));
00409         mpBc[ 1 ].Base = mpBc[ 1 ].Check = 1;
00410 
00411         // init TAIL array
00412         mTailPos        = 1;
00413         mTailMax        = tailSize;
00414         mTailExtendSize = tailExtendSize;
00415 
00416         mpTail = new unsigned char [ mTailMax + KEY_LEN ];
00417 
00418         /*
00419         for( i = 0; i < mTailMax + KEY_LEN; ++i)
00420                 mpTail[ i ] = '\0';
00421         */
00422         memset(mpTail, 0x00, sizeof(char)*(mTailMax + KEY_LEN));
00423         mpTail[ 0 ] = (unsigned char)TERMINAL;
00424 
00425         return 0;
00426 }
00427 
00428 void WK_DaTrie::free()
00429 {
00430         if (mpBc)   delete [] mpBc;
00431         mpBc     = 0;
00432         mBcPos   = 0;
00433         mBcMax   = 0;
00434 
00435         if (mpTail) delete [] mpTail;
00436         mpTail   = 0;
00437         mTailPos = 0;
00438         mTailMax = 0;
00439 }
00440 
00441 int WK_DaTrie::extendBc(void)
00442 {
00443         int totalCells  = mBcMax + mBcExtendSize;
00444 
00445         // extend double-array
00446         WK_DaTrie_BaseCheck *pBc = new WK_DaTrie_BaseCheck [ totalCells + NUM_CODES ];
00447         if (!pBc) {
00448                 fprintf(stderr, "memory alloc failed\n");
00449                 free();
00450                 exit(1);
00451         }
00452         
00453         // init new memory
00454         memset((char*)&pBc[mBcMax + NUM_CODES],
00455                         0x00, sizeof(WK_DaTrie_BaseCheck)*(mBcExtendSize));
00456         /*
00457         memset(pBc,
00458                         0x00, sizeof(WK_DaTrie_BaseCheck)*(totalCells + NUM_CODES));
00459         */
00460 
00461         // copy double-array
00462         memcpy(pBc, mpBc, sizeof(WK_DaTrie_BaseCheck)*(mBcMax + NUM_CODES));
00463 
00464         // change new double-array
00465         delete [] mpBc;
00466 
00467         mpBc   = pBc;
00468         mBcMax = totalCells;
00469 
00470         return 0;
00471 }
00472 
00473 int WK_DaTrie::extendTail(void)
00474 {
00475         int tailSize    = mTailMax + mTailExtendSize;
00476 
00477         // new alloc tail buffer
00478         unsigned char *pTail = new unsigned char [ tailSize + KEY_LEN ];
00479         if (!pTail) {
00480                 fprintf(stderr, "memory alloc failed\n");
00481                 free();
00482                 exit(1);
00483         }
00484 
00485         if (mpTail) {
00486                 // copy tail
00487                 memcpy(pTail, mpTail, sizeof(unsigned char)*(mTailMax + KEY_LEN));
00488                 // change tail
00489                 delete [] mpTail;
00490         }
00491 
00492         mpTail   = pTail;
00493         mTailMax = tailSize;
00494 
00495         return 0;
00496 }
00497 
00498 int WK_DaTrie::insertKey(const char *pKey, WK_DaTrie_Node &rNode)
00499 {
00500         rNode.setRoot();
00501         if(mpBc == 0) return 0;
00502 
00503         int nextIndex, index = 1;
00504         unsigned char pKeyBuff[ KEY_LEN + 2 ];
00505         unsigned char *key = pKeyBuff;
00506 
00507         appendTerminator(pKey, pKeyBuff);
00508 
00509         while( mpBc[ index ].Base >= 0 ) {
00510                 nextIndex = mpBc[ index ].Base + CODE[ *key++ ];
00511 
00512                 if( nextIndex > mBcPos || mpBc[ nextIndex ].Check != index ){
00513                         insertA( index, key - 1, rNode );
00514                         
00515                         return 1;
00516                 }
00517                 else index = nextIndex;
00518         }
00519 
00520         int mpDataPos=0;
00521         if( *( key - 1 ) == (unsigned char)TERMINAL ) {
00522                 //4byte node
00523                 rNode.mState=mpBc[ index ].Base;
00524                 rNode.mpData=mpTail+(-rNode.mState);
00525                 return 1;
00526         }
00527         else if((mpDataPos=compareTail(index, key))>0 ) {
00528                 //4byte node
00529                 rNode.mState = -(mpDataPos+1);
00530                 rNode.mpData = mpTail+(mpDataPos+1);
00531 
00532                 return 1;
00533         }
00534 
00535         insertB( index, key, rNode );
00536 
00537         return 1;
00538 }

00544         if(mpBc == 0) return 0;

00547         unsigned char pKeyBuff[ KEY_LEN + 2 ];
00548         unsigned char *key = pKeyBuff;
00549         
00550         appendTerminator(pKey, pKeyBuff);
00551 
00552         while( mpBc[ index ].Base >= 0 ) {
00553                 nextIndex = mpBc[ index ].Base + CODE[ *key++ ];
00554 
00555                 if( nextIndex > mBcPos || mpBc[ nextIndex ].Check != index ){
00556                         return 0;
00557                 }
00558                 else index = nextIndex;
00559         }
00560 
00561         int mpDataPos=0;
00562         if( *( key - 1 ) == (unsigned char)TERMINAL ) {
00563                 //4byte node
00564                 rNode.mState=mpBc[ index ].Base;
00565                 rNode.mpData=mpTail+(-rNode.mState);
00566 
00567                 return 1;
00568         }
00569         else if((mpDataPos=compareTail(index, key))>0 ) {
00570                 //4byte node
00571                 rNode.mState = -(mpDataPos+1);
00572                 rNode.mpData = mpTail+(mpDataPos+1);
00573 
00574                 return 1;
00575         }
00576 
00577         return 0;
00578 }
00579 
00580 int WK_DaTrie::findNode(const char ch, WK_DaTrie_Node &rNode)
00581 {
00582         if(mpBc == 0) return 0;
00583 
00584         int t, c;
00585         unsigned char *pTail;
00586 
00587         // reset idx pointer
00588         rNode.mpData = 0;
00589 
00590         // new
00591         if (rNode.mState>0)
00592         {
00593                 t = mpBc[ rNode.mState ].Base + CODE[ (unsigned char)ch ];
00594                 c = mpBc[ t ].Check;
00595 
00596                 if ((t > mBcPos) || (c != rNode.mState)) return 0;
00597 
00598                 if (mpBc[ t ].Base < 0)
00599                 {
00600                         rNode.mState = mpBc[ t ].Base;
00601                         pTail        = mpTail + (-rNode.mState);
00602                         
00603                         if (*pTail == (unsigned char)TERMINAL)
00604                                 rNode.mpData = pTail+1;
00605                 }
00606                 else
00607                 {
00608                         rNode.mState = t;
00609 
00610                         t = mpBc[ rNode.mState ].Base + CODE[ (unsigned char)TERMINAL ];
00611                         c = mpBc[ t ].Check;
00612 
00613                         if (c != rNode.mState) return 1;
00614 
00615                         if ((c > 0) && (mpBc[ t ].Base < 0))
00616                                 rNode.mpData = mpTail + (-mpBc[ t ].Base);
00617                 }
00618 
00619                 return 1;
00620         }
00621         else {
00622                 // find ch from tail
00623                 pTail = mpTail + (-rNode.mState);
00624 
00625                 if (*pTail != (unsigned char)ch) return 0;
00626 
00627                 pTail++;
00628                 rNode.mState -= 1;
00629                 
00630                 if (*pTail == (unsigned char)TERMINAL)
00631                         rNode.mpData = pTail + 1;
00632 
00633                 return 1;
00634         }
00635 
00636         return 0;
00637 }
